last_episode_to_air.name: You Still Want Everything to Be About You
last_episode_to_air.overview: Emma comes to terms with her parentage. While Mads helps Astraeus search for Emma and Lukas, Frederik and Marie have to choose sides.

name: Chosen
overview: A 17-year-old girl's world is turned upside down when she and her friends make a disturbing discovery in their quiet Danish town.

episodes.name: The Fact That Meteors Are Made of Glass Is Pretty Crazy!
episodes.overview: After losing her job at a local tourist attraction, Emma teams up with a group of teens investigating the secrets behind a meteor crash 17 years ago.

episodes.name: Just Think of Queen Margrethe
episodes.overview: Despite her mother's objection, Emma visits her biology teacher and meets an ominous figure. Marie and Frederik keep an eye on Hans.

episodes.name: Have You Heard?
episodes.overview: Still reeling from the attack, Emma searches for evidence to prove she isn't lying. Marie and Elvis find a mysterious plant in Hans' basement.

episodes.name: Call Mads
episodes.overview: The team follows a strange signal to an abandoned sawmill outside of town. Mads drives a wedge between Emma, Marie and Frederik.

episodes.name: You Hold It with Your Fingers. You Eat It with Your Mouth
episodes.overview: Emma and Lukas work together to track down a man from the sawmill. Mads confronts the CEO of Astraeus about his suspicions.

episodes.name: You Still Want Everything to Be About You
episodes.overview: Emma comes to terms with her parentage. While Mads helps Astraeus search for Emma and Lukas, Frederik and Marie have to choose sides.
